vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.2;
son of: Jahath (H3189);
brother of: Ahumai (H0267)
§ Lahad = "oppression"
son of Jahath, a descendant of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jáhat; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉哈 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "壓抑" (意義不明)
雅哈的兒子, 猶大的後裔 (代上4:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉哈 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "压抑" (意义不明)
雅哈的儿子, 犹大的后裔 (代上4:2)
